title: Create FO-04 discovery agent definition
description:
Create the Mastra agent for generating dynamic screen content.

File to create: src/mastra/agents/fo-04/agent.ts

Agent must return structured JSON with:
- reflectiveStatement: string (empty on first screen)
- question: string
- initialChips: string[] (5-8 chips)
- expandedChips: string[] (10-15 chips)
- readyForAffirmations: boolean

System prompt should incorporate:
- Tone & Voice Guidelines from spec (warm, calm, non-clinical)
- Question Design Principles (invitations not tests)
- Understanding the 5 dimensions (emotional baseline, inner dialogue, needs, believability, life context)
- First screen special case: no reflective statement, question is 'What has been going on lately that brought you here?'

Reference docs/projects/2026-01-23-FO-04/trines-thoughts.md for detailed guidance.
acceptance_criteria: Agent file exists at src/mastra/agents/fo-04/agent.ts with createFO04DiscoveryAgent export
closed_reason: Created FO-04 discovery agent with system prompt incorporating tone guidelines and 5 dimensions
